laboratory_examinations.findings: Identified a deleterious germline DICER1 mutation c.3505dupT (p.[Ser1169Phefs*8]) and a somatic mutation c.5439G>T (p.[Glu1813Asp]) in case 1.
Revealed an inherited deleterious germline DICER1 mutation c.3579_3580delCA (predicted p.(Asn1193Lysfs*41)) and a somatic mutation c.5438A>G (p.[Glu1813Gly]) in case 2.
Identified an inherited deleterious germline DICER1 mutation c.2379T>G (predicted p.(Tyr793X)) and a somatic mutation c.5113G>A (p.[Glu1705Lys]) in case 3.
